title: Bondi attack: Duo visited Philippines on Indian passport – new details on Pak-origin shooters
content: Sajid and Naveed Akram, accused in the Bondi Beach killings, visited the Philippines last month, reportedly traveling on Indian passports. Philippine authorities are investigating their purpose and activities there, including alleged military-style training. The attack, targeting Jewish attendees at a Hanukkah event, is believed to be motivated by Islamic State ideology.

title: Goa nightclub fire: Luthra brothers deported from Thailand; Dec 6 blaze claimed 25 lives
content: Goa's Birch nightclub co-owners, Saurabh and Gaurav Luthra, wanted in connection with a fire that killed 25, are being deported from Thailand to India. They fled after the blaze, had their passports suspended, and were detained. Indian agencies are facilitating their return to face charges and questioning.

title: Watch: Mexico City lawmakers pull hair, elbow, slap during debate - what led to the drama?
content: Chaos erupted in Mexico City's Congress as women legislators from opposing parties engaged in a physical brawl, broadcast live. The clash, involving hair-pulling and blows, stemmed from a protest by the right-wing PAN party against the ruling Morena party's alleged rule-breaking during a transparency agency reform debate. The opposition was forcibly removed, leading to a resumed session without their presence.

title: IND vs SA: Breather from run-fests? Why low-scoring T20Is are India's comfort zone
content: With the batting lacking consistency, the team may be forced to draw up bowler-centric strategies heading into the T20 World Cup, especially since many of India’s recent wins have been set up by their potent bowling attack

title: Apple’s high-end headphones turn 5: New model still years away; criticism mounts
content: Apple's premium AirPods Max, launched five years ago, remain a costly purchase with aging 2019 technology. Despite strong demand initially, users report durability issues and a lack of modern features found in newer AirPods. A second-generation model is anticipated in 2027, potentially bringing significant upgrades, making the current version a questionable buy.

title: UP road accident: Several buses catch fire on Delhi-Agra expressway after collision; 4 killed
content: In a shocking turn of events early Tuesday, the Delhi-Agra Expressway near Mathura witnessed a devastating blaze as multiple buses caught fire, raising concerns for those on board. The incident occurred amid a thick veil of smog engulfing Uttar Pradesh, which severely compromised visibility, even obscuring the majestic Taj Mahal.

title: Privacy tool exit: Google to retire Dark Web Report for Gmail users; Claims it didn’t offer help
content: Google is retiring its free Dark Web monitoring tool for Gmail users, citing a lack of helpful next steps and meaningful alerts. The tool, which scanned email addresses for data breaches, will cease new scans on January 15, 2026, and be fully unavailable by February 16, 2026. Google encourages users to utilize other security tools to protect their information.

title: BJP's Bihar power play continues: Sanjay Saraogi gets top job in state; who is he
content: Indian politics sees a fresh face in leadership as Sanjay Saraogi, a six-time MLA from Darbhanga, steps up as the new president of Bihar BJP, taking over from Dilip Kumar Jaiswal. With a robust background in the ABVP and a long-standing commitment to the party, Saraogi vows to bolster the party's framework in alignment with Prime Minister Modi's vision.

title: Nvidia responds to DeepSeek report; denies claims of ‘banned’ chips behind Jan market rout
content: Nvidia has denied reports that Chinese AI startup DeepSeek is using smuggled Blackwell GPUs, calling the claims "far-fetched." The US has restricted these advanced chips from export to China to maintain its AI lead. DeepSeek's earlier AI model launch at a lower cost had already raised concerns about China's rapid progress.

title: 'Always with her': Prithviraj, Supriya share survivor's post
content: Following the 2017 actress assault case verdict, actor Prithviraj Sukumaran and producer Supriya Menon publicly backed the survivor. Manju Warrier voiced her support, stating justice remains incomplete as the alleged mastermind walks free. She emphasized that true justice requires punishing all involved, advocating for the safety and dignity of all women.

title: Rupee falls to fresh low! Currency reaches 90.83 against US dollar
content: The Indian rupee continued its decline, hitting a new intra-day low of 90.83 against the US dollar on Tuesday. Persistent foreign fund outflows and trade uncertainties are weighing on the currency, despite a recent improvement in the trade deficit. Analysts anticipate continued pressure in the near term due to a delayed trade deal and FII outflows.

title: Blake Lively calls Taylor Swift 'the dreamiest friend' amid Eras Tour buzz
content: Blake Lively celebrated a business venture amid reports of a strained friendship with Taylor Swift. Swift is reportedly "hurt" and feels used due to Lively's legal issues involving her "It Ends with Us" co-star. Lively's social media post focused on her haircare brand collaboration, pointedly avoiding any mention of Swift, highlighting a careful navigation of public perception and personal relationships.

title: MLB trade rumors: Braves eye $325M Rangers star to boost title odds
content: Atlanta Braves are reportedly exploring a blockbuster trade for Texas Rangers star Corey Seager, a move that could significantly alter the NL playoff landscape. Despite Seager's hefty contract and a no-trade clause, the Braves see him as a crucial solution for their shortstop woes. This potential deal offers Atlanta elite offense and Texas a chance to rebuild their farm system.

title: Where does Auston Matthews live? Inside Leafs star’s homes and lifestyle
content: Auston Matthews' net worth is estimated at $30 million in 2025, driven by his substantial NHL salary and lucrative endorsement deals with major brands like Nike and RBC. Beyond hockey, he has strategically invested in startups and actively supports men's health through philanthropy, showcasing a multi-faceted financial profile.

title: Watch: US conducts strikes on 3 suspected narco-trafficking vessels; video shows 'kinetic strike'
content: The US military conducted a "lethal kinetic strike" on three suspected drug-trafficking vessels in the eastern Pacific, resulting in eight deaths. This operation, targeting organizations designated as terrorist groups, is part of Washington's intensified maritime campaign against narco-terrorist networks in the region.

title: Stock market today: Nifty50 opens below 26,000; BSE Sensex down over 300 points
content: Stock market today: Nifty50 and BSE Sensex, the Indian equity benchmark indices, opened in red on Tuesday on weak global cues. While Nifty50 went below 26,000, BSE Sensex was down over 300 points.

title: IPL 2026 dates confirmed: Season to run from March 26 to May 31
content: IPL 2026 is set to commence on March 26 and conclude on May 31, with the opening match potentially at Bengaluru's Chinnaswamy Stadium, pending government clearance. Franchise representatives met in Abu Dhabi to finalise these dates ahead of Tuesday's auction. The auction will feature a pool of 359 players, with marquee names like Cameron Green expected to fetch high bids.

title: ‘Sheltered killer of Moose Wala’: Gunmen pose for selfie, gun down kabaddi player; what police said
content: A kabaddi player and promoter was shot dead at a live tournament in Mohali after gunmen posed for selfies with him. The killing, claimed by a rival gang as revenge for Sidhu Moose Wala's murder, has raised concerns about Punjab's law and order. The attackers fled after firing several shots in the air.

title: 'Avengers: Doomsday' teaser trailers leaked online
content: Marvel's highly anticipated 'Avengers: Doomsday' trailer launch was marred by three leaks, igniting fan frenzy. Reports suggest Captain America's return as a father, Thor's potential demise leading to Valhalla, and Robert Downey Jr.'s dramatic debut as Doctor Doom, hinting at timeline disruptions and ambitious casting.

title: Top stocks to buy: Stock market recommendations for today - check list
content: Stock market recommendations: Mirae Asset Sharekhan's Somil Mehta suggests buying Union Bank of India, UPL, and Britannia Industries today, December 16, 2025.  These stocks are poised for an uptrend, showing positive momentum and consolidating near key moving averages.

title: Supreme Court grants relief to Shreyas Talpade and Alok Nath in marketing scam case
content: The Supreme Court granted interim relief to actors Shreyas Talpade and Alok Nath, barring their arrest in a cheating and breach of trust case. The actors sought merging of FIRs across states. The FIR, filed by Sonipat resident Vipul Antil, alleges they promoted a society accused of defrauding the public.

title: Celina seeks Rs 100cr compensation and Rs 10L monthly maintenance from Peter Haag in DV case
content: Celina Jaitly and her estranged husband, Austrian hotelier Peter Haag, appeared before a metropolitan magistrate’s court in Andheri on Friday, where the court directed both parties to file their income affidavits by January 27. The court also asked Haag to submit his reply to Jaitly’s domestic violence (DV) complaint. The directions were issued during the first hearing of the case filed by the actor in November under the Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act.

title: ‘Acted intentionally, maliciously’: Trump sues BBC over edited Jan 6 speech; seeks $10bn in defamation claim
content: US President Donald Trump has filed a $ 10 billion defamation lawsuit against the BBC. He alleges the broadcaster misleadingly edited a 2021 speech, falsely suggesting he incited supporters to storm the Capitol. Trump claims the BBC's actions caused significant reputational and financial harm, amounting to election interference.

title: 'Hazardous' AQI: Delhi, Noida, Ghaziabad schools shift Nursery–class V classes online
content: Delhi, Noida and Ghaziabad have shifted classes from Nursery to Class V entirely online as hazardous AQI levels persist across NCR under GRAP restrictions. Authorities have mandated hybrid classes for students of Classes VI to IX and Class XI, while Classes X and XII will continue attending school for exams and practicals. The decision prioritises children’s health as pollution remains severe, with officials directing strict compliance across government and private schools.

title: Watch: Private jet crashes during emergency landing in Mexico
content: A small plane crashed in central Mexico while attempting an emergency landing, resulting in at least seven fatalities. The private jet, which had departed from Acapulco, reportedly tried to land on a soccer field in San Mateo Atenco but struck a business roof, igniting a significant fire. The incident is currently under investigation.

title: 'Everything fine': Shashi Tharoor on absence from Congress' Delhi rally
content: Congress MP Shashi Tharoor explained his absence from the party's "Vote Chor, Gaddi Chhod" rally, citing a prior international commitment made six months ago. He assured that there were no issues from his side, despite recently skipping other party meetings and praising Prime Minister Modi.

title: IPL Auction: Why Green and other overseas stars can't earn beyond Rs 18 crore - Explained
content: A new IPL rule caps overseas player salaries at INR 18 crore, regardless of auction bids, to enforce financial discipline and prevent inflation.  While franchises pay the full bid amount, the excess goes to the BCCI's player welfare fund, with Indian players remaining unaffected by this cap.

title: Russia-Ukraine war: Trump assures peace deal 'closer than ever' - watch
content: President Trump stated a peace deal for the Ukraine-Russia war is closer than ever, citing ongoing European leader and Ukrainian President Zelenskyy talks in Berlin. He highlighted significant European support for ending the conflict, though acknowledged difficulties in aligning Russia and Ukraine on settlement terms and timing.

title: 'Pathaan 2': Will Jr NTR return to Spy Universe to face off against Shah Rukh Khan?
content: Fans are buzzing as Jr NTR reportedly joins Shah Rukh Khan for 'Pathaan 2', a significant expansion of his role in the Spy Universe. Initially slated for a solo film, his character is now set to be a formidable presence, potentially a parallel lead or antagonist, directly challenging Khan's Pathaan.

title: A holiday party, a blow-up, and a murder: Inside the Rob Reiner and wife Michele Singer nightmare
content: A Hollywood Christmas party argument reportedly preceded a horrific family tragedy. Director Rob Reiner's son, Nick, allegedly murdered his parents after a volatile dispute, fueled by fears of his spiraling mental health and drug relapse.  Nick, who has a history of addiction and violent outbursts, was arrested and charged with their murders.

title: Tariffs shrugged off: Exports beat Trump curbs, record fastest growth in over 3 years
content: India's exports surged 19.4% in November, reaching $38.1 billion, the fastest growth in over three years, driven by strong shipments to the US and China. This robust performance, coupled with a 2% dip in imports, narrowed the trade deficit to its lowest since June. Key sectors like engineering goods and electronics led the export boom, indicating market diversification.

title: Mexico: 7 killed as private jet hits rooftop during emergency landing
content: A private jet crashed in San Mateo Atenco, Mexico, during an emergency landing attempt, claiming seven lives. The aircraft, en route from Acapulco to Toluca, struck a business rooftop, igniting a massive fire that necessitated the evacuation of around 130 people. Authorities are still working to recover all bodies from the wreckage.

title: Who is Dr Anjali Nimbalkar? Karnataka Ex-MLA saves life of co-passenger mid-air; CM reacts
content: Former Karnataka MLA and doctor Anjali Nimbalkar saved an American woman's life by performing CPR during a medical emergency on a Goa-New Delhi flight. Nimbalkar's quick thinking and medical expertise revived the passenger who had lost consciousness and pulse. Her selfless act was widely praised by passengers, crew, and Chief Minister Siddaramaiah.

title: Ukraine war talks: US agrees to offer security guarantees to Kyiv – report
content: The United States has agreed to offer security guarantees to Ukraine following talks with President Zelenskyy in Berlin. Discussions narrowed differences on security assurances and Russia's territorial demands, with a US-drafted peace plan reportedly 90% agreed. Further negotiations are anticipated, with a ceasefire requiring strong legal and material backing.

title: Geronimo dos Santos cause of death: How did ex-UFC fighter die at 45
content: Former MMA fighter Geronimo dos Santos, known as “Mondragon,” has died at 45 after drowning in the Rio Negro in Brazil. His body was recovered by fire department divers after he went missing during a swim. Santos had a long career, including a UFC signing that was canceled due to a Hepatitis B diagnosis.

title: IPL: Who is Mallika Sagar? Meet the woman set to conduct the auction
content: Mallika Sagar, a trailblazing auctioneer, will lead the IPL 2026 auction. With a unique career bridging fine art and elite sports, she became Christie's first Indian woman auctioneer in New York. Sagar has since broken barriers in Indian sports, notably as the first female auctioneer for the Pro Kabaddi League and the Women's Premier League.

title: Pahalgam attack: Pak handler among 7 named in NIA chargesheet; LeT charged as entity first time
content: The NIA has taken decisive legal action against Lashkar-e-Taiba and The Resistance Front for their involvement in the Pahalgam terror attack. The chargesheet lists seven suspects, featuring the notorious Pakistani handler Sajid Jatt and three deceased militants from Pakistan.

title: WhatsApp users’ consent mandatory for collection of data, says NCLAT
content: Meta Platforms and WhatsApp challenged this order before the NCLAT, which, in January this year, passed an interim order, staying the five-year ban imposed by the CCI on data-sharing practices between WhatsApp and Meta for advertising purposes

title: EC publishes list of voters deleted from draft electoral rolls in Bengal under SIR 2026
content: The list features voters whose names were included in the electoral rolls of the state in 2025 but were deleted from the draft rolls of 2026

title: Soldier dies in landmine blast in J&K's Kupwara
content: “Havildar Zubair Ahmad of the Army's 13 Jammu and Kashmir Light Infantry was injured in a land mine blast at Putaha Khan Gali in the Trehgam area of the border district on December 15, 2025,” says officials

title: Vijay Diwas 2025: PM Modi salutes armed forces; President Murmu pays homage to 1971 war soldiers
content: Vijay Diwas is celebrated on December 16 every year to honour the soldiers who fought in the 1971 Indo-Pak war, which culminated in the surrender of Pakistan's Army

title: At least four killed, 25 injured in Yamuna Expressway pile-up; buses catch fire amid dense fog in Mathura
content: According to a Mathura Police statement on X, the pile-up at Milestone 127 involved seven buses and three smaller vehicles. "None of the injured are in critical condition," it said

title: Parliament Winter session Day 12 LIVE: Discussion on electoral reforms to continue today
content: Viksit Bharat Guarantee for Rozgar and Ajeevika Mission (Gramin) is likely to be introduced in the House

title: Opposition boycotts Chhattisgarh Assembly proceedings over paddy procurement issue
content: Congress members alleged that the scale of mismanagement and the problems faced by farmers since the beginning of the season were unprecedented

title: 25 years later, Uttarakhand Police arrest key accused in Himgiri Plantation fraud case
content: “Two brothers had formed a company, Himgiri Plantation, in 1993. They promised investors attractive returns, including doubling their money in a short span,” says the complainant

title: Goa nightclub fire: Thai authorities deport Luthra brothers to India
content: The deportation comes amid an ongoing probe into the deadly blaze, which triggered widespread outrage and led to scrutiny over alleged safety violations and lapses by the nightclub management

title: Inhalable microplastics, a hidden toxin worsening Indian cities’ air
content: A first-of-its-kind study has examined inhalable microplastics in four Indian cities. These are plastic particles smaller than 10 µm, which researchers have warned can also smuggle in toxic co-pollutants such as heavy metals and hormone-disrupting compounds

title: Caught in a Limbo: Unfinished ramps delay full benefits of double-decker flyover, rotary flyover at Baiyappanahalli fails to take off
content: Despite the commissioning of Namma Metro’s Yellow Line, large sections of the double-decker flyover that runs alongside the elevated corridor remain incomplete, continuing to test the patience of thousands of daily commuters

title: Singapore High Commission’s advisory on air pollution triggers war of words
content: The advisory posted by Singapore High Commissioner Simon Wong on X urged Singapore nationals in the Delhi National Capital Region to pay heed to restrictions imposed under Stage IV of the Graded Response Action Plan in Delhi

title: Army celebrates Vijay Diwas, hails indigenous technology
content: The Defence Ministry said the celebrations highlighted the Indian Army’s steady transformation into a modern, innovative and self-reliant force

title: Act against Oppn. MLAs behind interference in power projects of national importance in Kishtwar: Omar Abdullah
content: “It should be viewed seriously. These are institutions of national importance and no interference should be allowed. Such projects are not just for J&K but the entire country,” said Omar Abdullah

title: Why full audio clip on Manipur violence was not sent to forensics, asks SC
content: The top court said it was a “little disturbed” by the affidavit filed on behalf of the petitioners that “states to the effect that only select clippings were sent” for forensics

title: Minimum temperature in Telangana likely to dip by 3-4°C over next two days
content: According to data from Telangana Development Planning Society, between December 14 and 15, seven districts in the State recorded minimum temperatures of 10°C or below with Sirpur in Kumaram Bheem Asifabad district recording the lowest minimum temperature of 7.6°C.

title: In Kochi Corporation, Palluruthy is LDF’s only bright spot
content: The front performed relatively better in certain pockets and far worse in others across the four CPI(M) area committee limits within the civic body

title: ‘AQI’, ‘AQI’ chants greet CM Rekha Gupta at Messi event in smog-hit Delhi
content: A video showing a section of the crowd chanting 'AQI', 'AQI' has gone viral on social media, prompting the Aam Aadmi Party (AAP) to attack Ms. Gupta over the ‘severe’ pollution levels gripping the capital.

title: Kanchi Kamakoti Peetam moves Madras High Court to take back its elephants
content: Justice V. Lakshminarayanan directs Principal Chief Conservator of Forests-cum-Chief Wildlife Warden to inspect a 2.94 acre facility created by the Mutt at Konerikuppam to house the pachyderms

title: GI tag sought for Thoothukudi pearls
content: It highlights the cultural and symbolic significance of Thoothukudi pearls in Tamil tradition, where they were associated with purity, divinity and royal power. The pearls were traditionally used in temple offerings, royal ornaments and diplomatic gifts

title: City distillery Khoday rejigs its positioning in alcobev industry, after remaining sober for over a decade
content: To invest ₹50 crore to expand its distillery off Kanakpura Road, scale up production facilities in other parts of the country

title: Encounter on in Jammu’s Udhampur as security forces encircle a group of terrorists
content: A joint team of Special Operation Group along with the Army and the CRPF is on job, says a police spokesman

title: Identify land for Navodaya Vidyalayas, Supreme Court tells Tamil Nadu government
content: SC asks Centre and State to enter into mutual consultations; says State is at liberty to air its grievances

title: 103 firemen terminated over ‘compromised process of recruitment’ in J&K
content: ACB inquiry panel found “large-scale OMR sheet tampering, fabricated scanned images of answer sheets and illegal manipulation of merit list.

title: Inside Director Rob Reiner's Fight With Son At Christmas Party Before Murder
content: Hollywood icon Rob Reiner's drug-addicted son Nick Reiner, who is accused of killing his parents, had a massive blow-up at Conan O'Brien's Christmas party Saturday, according to US media reports.

title: Luthras, Owners Of Goa Club Where Fire Killed 25, Deported From Bangkok
content: The Luthra brothers, against whom a case of culpable homicide and negligence is registered, had fled to Thailand's Phuket hours after the tragedy on an IndiGo flight.

title: Who Is Nick Reiner, Son Accused Of Killing Hollywood Director Rob Reiner, Wife
content: The 32-year-old son of legendary Hollywood director Rob Reiner and producer Michele Singer Reiner is "responsible" for the deaths of his parents, according to Los Angeles police.

title: 10 Buses, Cars Crash, Catch Fire Amid Fog On Delhi-Agra Expressway, 4 Dead
content: At least four people were killed and 25 others injured in a major road accident on the Delhi-Agra Expressway in Mathura on Tuesday morning after seven buses and three cars collided due to dense fog.

title: Delhi's Air Quality Improves Marginally, AQI 'Very Poor' At 378
content: The National Capital Delhi continued to reel under hazardous air conditions on Tuesday as the city's overall AQI stood at 378 at around 8 am, placing it in the 'very poor' category, according to data from the Central Pollution Control Board.

title: Rich-Poor Gap Closing For Assets, Rural India Racing Ahead: N Sitharaman In Parliament
content: Growth over the last decade has been "broad-based" and the consumption gap among the rich and poor in both urban and rural India is rapidly shrinking, Union finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman told parliament on Monday.

title: "Was Elected 4 Times On Same Machine": Supriya Sule Junks EVM Rigging Charge
content: Supriya Sule, an ally of the Congress-led INDIA bloc, made the remarks days after Congress leader Rahul Gandhi attacked the Centre over poll rigging - a charge the Opposition has been making for many years.

title: 4 Arrested In California For Plotting Bomb Attacks On New Year's Eve
content: Federal authorities said Monday that they foiled a plot to bomb multiple sites of two US companies on New Year's Eve in Southern California after arresting members of an extremist anti-capitalist and anti-government group.

title: Donald Trump Sues BBC For $10 Billion Over Edited Capitol Speech
content: US President Donald Trump on Monday filed a lawsuit seeking at least $10 billion from the BBC over a documentary that edited his 2021 speech to supporters ahead of the US Capitol riot.

title: 'Jailed Imran Khan, Gave Life-Time Immunity To Asim Munir': India Slams Pak At UN
content: India's Permanent Representative to the UN, Ambassador Harish Parvathaneni, called out Islamabad's "obsessive focus on harming India and its people."

title: "Don't Roam Without Guardian": UP Cops 'Advice' To Girl Sparks Row
content: A station house officer in eastern Uttar Pradesh has been transferred after she allegedly stopped a girl and her brother at a temple park in Mau district and advised her not to venture out in public places without a "guardian", officials said

title: "Bondi Beach Shooters Driven by ISIS ideology": Australian PM Albanese
content: Sajid Akram and Naveed Akram, the father-son duo who killed 15 people on Sydney's Bondi Beach during a mass shooting, appeared to be driven by "Islamic State ideology" when they opened fire on a Jewish festival, said Australian PM Anthony Albanese.

title: French First Lady Apologises Over B**ches Remark After Feminist Backlash
content: France's first lady Brigitte Macron apologised on Monday for using a slur against activists that sparked a feminist backlash, trying to quell an incident that generated a social media trend against her.

title: Amid Growing Tensions With Venezuela, US Military To Use Trinidad Airports
content: The Caribbean nation of Trinidad and Tobago said Monday it had authorized US military aircraft to use its airports, amid growing fears Washington may be preparing an attack on nearby Venezuela.

title: Face Mask, Two-Tone Jacket: New Footage Of Brown University Shooting Suspect
content: Officials released three new videos of the man they believe carried out Saturday's attack that show him wearing a mask and a dark two-tone jacket.

title: President Rejects Mercy Plea Of Man Convicted Of Raping 2-Year-Old
content: President Droupadi Murmu has rejected the mercy petition of a man convicted of kidnapping, raping and killing a two-year-old girl in Maharashtra in 2012, officials said on Sunday.

title: Video: Ukraine Hits Russian Submarine In First Underwater Drone Attack
content: Ukrainian underwater drones struck and disabled a Russian Kilo-class attack submarine in the Russian navy's most important remaining Black Sea base, in the first operation of its kind, Ukrainian officials said on Monday.

title: UK Defence Chief Says "Whole Nation" Must Be Ready To Fight Amid Russia Threat
content: The new head of Britain's armed forces warned on Monday that "more" Britons will need to be ready to fight for their country due to an increasingly dangerous world.

title: Trump Brands Fentanyl A "Weapon Of Mass Destruction" In Drug War Escalation
content: Donald Trump signed an executive order declaring fentanyl a weapon of mass destruction, a move that dramatically expands the US government's authority to fight the synthetic opioid blamed for tens of thousands of American overdose deaths each year.

title: Supreme Court extends interim protection from arrest granted to actors in chit fund case
content: Top court says endorsement alone cannot make actors liable; interim relief to continue till investigation concludes

title: Bengaluru’s wastewater management may get Swiss tech boost
content: Bengaluru’s wastewater management systems may soon receive a global upgrade, with Swiss start-ups expressing interest in piloting advanced treatment technologies at the city’s sewage treatment plants

title: PM mourns death of Assam editor P.G. Baruah
content: Prafulla Gobinda Baruah, also the managing director of The Assam Tribune group, breathed his last on December 14 night

title: Potti Sriramulu’s house in Chennai will be developed as a memorial, says A.P. CM
content: Smruthi Vanam is being built in Amaravati where a statue of Sriramulu will be installed and named as the ‘Statue of Sacrifice’, says Naidu

title: Armed with objections against ward delimitation, legislators make a beeline to GHMC
content: Leaders from Congress, BRS, BJP raise concerns over voter imbalance, unclear criteria and lack of consultation with sitting legislators; over 1,300 suggestions received so far; December 17 set as deadline for submission of objections

title: Lokesh urges Centre to sanction 11 Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalayas to A.P.
content: The HRD Minister highlights the Guaranteed Foundational Literacy and Numeracy programme and Interactive Classroom Response System implemented in State

title: Two security personnel injured in IED blast in Chhattisgarh’s Bijapur
content: “During the operation, two Cobra personnel sustained minor injuries in an IED blast and have been sent to Raipur for better treatment,” a police said

title: Chennai-bound Vande Bharat Express chugs off from Narsapur
content: The train will halt at Bhimavaram Town, Gudivada, Vijayawada, Tenali, Ongole, Nellore and Renigunta before reaching MGR Chennai Central station

title: Air India CEO apologises to Congress MP
content: Senior Congress leader K.C. Venugopal moved a privilege motion against the Air India CEO Campbell Wilson in connection with a flight the former took in August

title: Watch: Senior Congress Leader Shamanur Shivashankarappa Passes Away
content: Veteran Congress leader and Davanagere South MLA Shamanur Shivashankarappa passed away on December 14, 2025, at the age of 94 due to age-related complications

title: Manipur BJP legislators’ Delhi meeting a crash course for students: Congress
content: A total of 34 MLAs, including some belonging to the Kuki community, took part in the meeting on Sunday

title: SHANTI Bill spurs private sector to make, run nuclear plants
content: The SHANTI Bill penalises operators in case of a nuclear accident, requiring them to compensate on the basis of the the size of plants operated and not the damage experienced in itself

title: Watch: Lionel Messi ends G.O.A.T. India Tour with grand Delhi finale
content: Lionel Messi brought his much-anticipated G.O.A.T. India Tour to a spectacular close in Delhi, thrilling thousands of fans after a chaotic start in Kolkata on December 13.

title: SIR process is based on Constitutional framework: Centre
content: Citing precedence, Law Minister says EC’s revision took place earlier too under various governments; Opposition continues criticism over exercise

title: PM Modi and Jordan’s King discuss bilateral ties, exchange perspectives on regional and global issues
content: The full-fledged bilateral visit to Jordan is taking place after 37 years, coinciding with the 75th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the two countries

title: Calcutta HC to hear PILs on violence at Messi event; five spectators held
content: Petitioners have sought the court’s intervention in transferring the probe from the West Bengal Police to Central investigating agencies

title: LDF, UDF begin post-poll deliberations in Kozhikode
content: While the LDF has much to ponder over the drubbing in some of its traditional strongholds, the UDF is elated about the more-than-anticipated victory of its candidates across the district

title: Government proposes to send VBSA Bill to JPC
content: The Bill seeks to subsume the UGC, AICTE, NCTE, and separate funding from the regulatory body; the Opposition has slammed the Bill as an “attack on federalism”

title: Good communists voted for UDF, says Satheesan
content: Leader of the Opposition says a majority of Left fellow travellers aligned with the UDF  in the local body polls; UDF to shift its focus to Assembly elections from January

title: Thirupparankundram row: Tamil Nadu tells Madras High Court pillar belongs to Jains, not Hindus
content: A Division Bench of Justices G. Jayachandran and K.K. Ramakrishnan continued to hear the arguments preferred against the order of Justice G.R. Swaminathan, who directed the Subramaniya Swamy temple management to light the Karthigai Deepam at the deepathoon besides the usual places, and other connected appeals.

title: Unemployment rate falls to 4.7% in November, lowest since April: Government survey
content: The PLFS stated that the overall Labour Force Participation Rate increased to 55.8% in November, the highest level recorded since April.

title: In Kerala, Modi government favouring Adani group in highway road projects: Venugopal
content: Claiming a “highway scam”, the Congress MP says that from Kasaragod in the north to Kollam in the south, National Highway projects, two major stretches NH 66 and NH 544, are collapsing before the eyes of the public

title: KPCC president calls MGNREGS renaming an Insult to Mahatma Gandhi
content: Joseph says that the move not only disrespects Gandhi’s contributions but also risks destabilising a vital employment guarantee programme that has been crucial for rural livelihoods since its inception in 2005.

title: Beypore gears up for water fest
content: Contestants from five countries are expected to take part in the kite festival, one of the major attractions of water fest; cycle rally from Kozhikode to Beypore on December 25 to herald the start of the festival

title: Nadda appoints Sanjay Saraogi as new Bihar BJP president
content: The 56-year-old leader is five times MLA hails from the Vaishya community, which is the core voter of the party. He earlier served as the coordinator of the Bihar State BJP Cow Protection Cell.

title: Attracting younger audiences to classical music concerts is a challenge, says A.R. Rahman
content: The Oscar-winning music director inaugurates the 99th annual music conference and concerts of the Music Academy; presents the M.S. Subbulakshmi Award and the cash prize instituted by The Hindu to violinist R.K. Shriramkumar, the Sangita Kalanidhi designate for 2025

title: Insult to Mahatma Gandhi: Opposition attacks Centre over new rural jobs law
content: The Viksit Bharat Guarantee for Rozgar and Ajeevika Mission (Gramin) (VB-G RAM G) Bill, 2025, was listed in the supplementary list of business of the Lok Sabha on December 15

title: District court grants bail to YouTuber Rahul Easwar in survivor intimidation case
content: On his release, Rahul Easwar alleged a conspiracy at Chief Minister Pinarayi Vijayan’s level to silence him by incarcerating him during the politically sensitive campaign phase of the local body elections in Kerala

title: IFFK 2025: Anti-ageism film Blue Trail portrays the joy of discovering the new at old age
content: Brazilian filmmaker Gabriel Mascaro’s Blue Trail  follows a senior citizen’s determination to pursue her dream even as an all-powerful government tries to put her away in a colony meant for those above 80.

title: Supreme Court raises concerns about highways becoming death traps during winter
content: “The affidavit blamed local and police administrations, while the Court did not want to treat the case suo motu as an adverse litigation, but only wanted solutions to the problem,” says Justice Maheshwari

title: BJP MPs force adjournment in both Houses of Parliament over alleged threat to Modi
content: The ruling party members say the slogan ‘Modi’s grave will be dug, if not today, then tomorrow’ was raised in the Congress rally against ‘vote theft’ on Sunday. Alleging that it was a threat to the Prime Minister’s life, they demand the Opposition party tender an apology.

title: Karnataka govt. to revive probe into Chilume Trust case amid allegations of widespread voter fraud
content: The State government has appointed senior advocate Prof. Ravi Verma Kumar to represent the State in a writ petition before the High Court

title: S.P. Balasubrahmanyam’s statue unveiled at Ravindra Bharathi in Hyderabad
content: Minister Sridhar Babu says legendary playback singer, who rendered more than 40,000 songs in 14 Indian languages, had left an indelible mark on the history of film music

title: Chiefs' Mahomes has surgery for torn ACL, LCL
content: Chiefs quarterback Patrick Mahomes underwent successful surgery Monday in Dallas to repair the tear in his left ACL. A league source told ESPN that Mahomes also had a torn LCL that was repaired.

title: Texas QB Manning to return for 2026 season
content: Texas quarterback Arch Manning will return to school to play in 2026, finally putting to rest questions about his future beyond this season.

title: Interim coach says U-M's players feel 'betrayed'
content: Michigan interim coach Biff Poggi said Monday his players feel betrayed and angry following the firing and arrest of former coach Sherrone Moore.

title: Commanders shut down Daniels for rest of year
content: Jayden Daniels' injury-marred second season is over. The Commanders have shut down the quarterback a week after he aggravated his dislocated left, non-throwing elbow.

title: Spurs mull bringing Wemby off bench in Cup final
content: The Spurs are discussing different ways to deploy Victor Wembanyama vs. the Knicks in the NBA Cup final, including having him come off the bench.

title: Washington claims first NCAA men's soccer title
content: Harrison Bertos scored 1:54 into overtime after Washington let a two-goal lead slip against North Carolina State to earn its first Men's College Cup national championship.

title: Jurors hear closing arguments in Skaggs civil trial
content: Jurors on Monday heard closing arguments in a two-month civil trial over whether the Angels should be held responsible for pitcher Tyler Skaggs' fatal overdose in 2019.

title: 🔎 Steelers subtly troll Fins after MNF win
content: NFL teams remained petty in Week 15 with the Pittsburgh Steelers poking fun at the Miami Dolphins after a huge home win.

title: What move should your team make? Trade questions for all 30 franchises
content: With NBA trade season upon us, Bobby Marks examines the conversations happening across all 30 front offices.

title: Which NBA players can be traded? We have the full team-by-team lists
content: Bobby Marks runs through every roster, mapping out which players can and cannot be traded before Feb. 5.

title: Barnwell on two knee injuries with big implications: What now for the Packers, Chiefs?
content: Micah Parsons and Patrick Mahomes both suffered significant knee injuries Sunday. What do they mean for the Packers' playoff push and the Chiefs' offseason plans?

title: 'I'm not even in the top 28. I'm not in the top 29': MLB managers on rule changes, clutch players and each other
content: With all 30 skippers in one place at last week's winter meetings, we asked for their thoughts on the state of the game and more.

title: Women's AP poll reaction: Longhorns remain UConn's biggest rival
content: The sixth in-season women's AP Top 25 poll is out. Here's what's next for every team in the standings.

title: Latest men's AP poll: What's next for every Top 25 team?
content: The sixth in-season edition of the men's poll is out. Arizona retains the No. 1 spot amid a mostly unchanged top 10.

title: 'Crap, coach wasn't scared': Philip Rivers and more top NFL quotes from Week 15
content: Week 15 in the NFL brought abnormal scenarios and unpredictable moments that were voiced, producing some unforgettable quotes.

title: The third NBA Cup is nearly complete -- how do players and coaches feel about it now?
content: Is the NBA Cup working? Tim Bontemps details what's next for the tournament on the eve of the Knicks-Spurs title game.

title: Man United's thriller against Bournemouth is advert for January transfer window
content: Manchester United and Bournemouth played out to an entertaining match, but Ruben Amorim's side will need to improve ahead of next month's transfer window.

title: Maybe Salah's not finished at Liverpool after all; Real Madrid grit another win; more
content: Salah's star turn off the bench for Liverpool following speculation about his future showed that there's still a way for him to stay. PLUS: Madrid get a win too, but are still a work in progress.

title: Firing Alonso would be easy, but replacing him? Much harder
content: Madrid's manager may have bought himself time, while a lack of replacements could help him keep his the job.

title: A reason (or two) to watch every one of this season's bowl games
content: With first-year success stories, redemption  chances and general silliness, bowl season always delivers.

title: Pickups: Add Portis, Kuzma while Giannis is sidelined
content: Every week in fantasy basketball, there are available players who can help fill holes in your roster. Here are the ones to add for the week ahead.

title: Early Week 16 bets: Broncos over Jaguars, Drake Maye to win MVP among picks
content: Which lines offered value once odds came out? Here are games we are eyeing for bets going into Week 16.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Milan eye January move for Arsenal's Jesus
content: Will AC Milan be able to sign Gabriel Jesus in January? Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: SIR: Draft rolls for 5 states, UTs due today; deletions pegged at 7.5–8.5%
content: Bharti Jain is senior editor with The Times of India, New Delhi. She has been writing on security matters since 1996. Having covered the Union home ministry, security agencies, Election Commission and the ‘prime’ political beat, the Congress, for The Economic Times all these years, she moved to TOI in August 2012. Her repertoire of news stories delves into the whole gamut of issues related to terrorism and internal strife, besides probing strategic affairs in India’s neighbourhood. Read More

title: Free agent pickups: What can you do to replace Patrick Mahomes?
content: the 15th Sunday of the season featured several notable comebacks . a pair of season-ending knee injuries may define this week for both the short and long term . the qbs ranked second among all qBs in week 15 .

title: SS Kim returns to Braves on 1-year, $20M deal
content: SS Kim returns to the Atlanta Braves on 1-year, $20M deal . the 30-year-old had declined a $16 million player option in the two-year, $29 million contract he signed in february with Tampa Bay . a long-term contract with the braves was discussed before the agreement on a one-year contract .

title: Ranking all 64 teams in College Football Playoff history
content: the new era of college football features a larger College Football Playoff and a lower bar for inclusion . the transfer portal and increased freedom of movement for players have meant that today's best teams can't stockpile awesome backups as easily as they could in the past .

title: Best fits for transfer quarterback DJ Lagway: Five schools that make the most sense
content: DJ Lagway is the top-rated quarterback in the 2024 ESPN 300 . he's coming off a 4-8 season in which he threw 14 interceptions and ranked 14th in the conference in QBR (59.5) but there's still a market for his talents if the 19-game starter can find the right situation and stay healthy .

title: Aaron Rodgers, Steelers snap Dolphins' four-game win streak
content: the Steelers were en route to their 23rd consecutive "Monday Night Football" home win . a crowd of more than 65,000 cheered and waved their Terrible Towels as its opening notes filled the air . the steelers dominated the Dolphins nearly wire to wire as a short-handed defense slowed an explosive run game .

title: Big questions from Week 15 games: Can Pittsburgh's defense repeat against Detroit? What now for Chiefs?
content: the Falcons and the Dolphins are eliminated from playoff contention after losses to the Ravens and Chargers . quarterback Patrick Mahomes left the Chiefs' loss late in the fourth quarter with a left knee injury . the Texans and Jaguars also scored 40-plus points in dominant victories in the NFC East .

title: Has Lawrence leveled up? Pats-Bills rematch? Let's overreact to Week 15
content: the playoffs will be Chiefs-free for the first time in 11 years . it means the AFC Championship Game will be contested without the Chiefs . the playoff game will be held without the chiefs for a second time in eight years, it's not an overreaction .
